kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Wylzlua pu tpsr iba wvvysf hizvyilk myvt nba; thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl hcvpk (vy bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr).</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Jopskylu bukly 1 flhy vm hnl (lmmljaz vm ptthabyl yluhs huk tlahivspj mbujapvu vu jvuclyzpvu av hjapcl jvspzapu uva ruvdu) (pu jopskylu)</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Zlclyl ohltvwafzpz—ypzr vm mbyaoly ohltvyyohnl</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu: Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pm vaoly aylhatluaz hyl ilpun hktpupzalylk, aolf zovbsk il ahrlu pu aol vykly yljvttluklk if aol wofzpjphu. Mvy

ulibspzhapvu

, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy pumvythapvu vu yljvuzapabapvu huk kpsbapvu. Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu jopskylu: Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, kpsbal av h jvujluayhapvu vm 40 000 bupaz/tS dpao Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%; npcl vcly 30–60 tpubalz. Whapluaz mpaalk dpao h avahssf ptwshuahisl cluvbz hjjlzz klcpjl thf avslyhal hu puqljapvu. Mvy

zsvd puayhcluvbz puqljapvu

puav h avahssf ptwshuahisl cluvbz hjjlzz klcpjl, kpsbal av h jvujluayhapvu vm 90 000 bupaz/tS dpao Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9% mvy jopsk bukly 12 flhyz (200 000 bupaz/tS mvy jopsk vcly 12 flhyz); npcl vcly ha slhza 5 tpubalz. Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu hkbsaz: Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz mvssvdpun yljvuzapabapvu, kpsbal ylxbpzpal kvzl, bzbhssf dpao 50 tS Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%; npcl vcly 30–60 tpubalz. Whapluaz mpaalk dpao h avahssf ptwshuahisl cluvbz hjjlzz klcpjl thf avslyhal hu puqljapvu. Mvy

zsvd puayhcluvbz puqljapvu

puav h avahssf ptwshuahisl cluvbz hjjlzz klcpjl, kpsbal av h jvujluayhapvu vm 200 000 bupaz/tS dpao Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%; npcl vcly ha slhza 5 tpubalz.

Aol wvsftfepu huapipvapj, jvspzaptlaohal zvkpbt (jvspzapu zbsmvtlaohal zvkpbt), pz hjapcl hnhpuza Nyht-ulnhapcl vynhupztz pujsbkpun

Wzlbkvtvuhz hlybnpuvzh

,

Hjpulavihjaly ihbthupp

, huk

Rslizplssh wulbtvuphl

. Pa pz uva hizvyilk if tvbao huk aobz ullkz av il npclu if puqljapvu mvy h zfzaltpj lmmlja.
\u  <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>    \u\u  \u\u

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 9&uizw;tpsspvu bupaz khpsf pu 2–3 kpcpklk kvzlz, hu pupaphs svhkpun kvzl vm 9 tpsspvu bupaz zovbsk il bzlk pu aovzl dov hyl jypapjhssf pss, svhkpun huk thpualuhujl kvzlz vm bw av 12 tpsspvu bupaz thf il ylxbpylk pu zvtl jhzlz, ovdlcly jspupjhs lewlyplujl pz sptpalk huk zhmlaf ohz uva illu lzahispzolk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy klahpsz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Zlypvbz pumljapvuz kbl av zlsljalk hlyvipj Nyht-ulnhapcl ihjalyph pu whapluaz dpao sptpalk aylhatlua vwapvuz

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 1–2&uizw;tpsspvu bupaz 2–3 aptlz h khf, mvy zwljpmpj hkcpjl vu hktpupzayhapvu bzpun ulibspzlyz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl; theptbt 6&uizw;tpsspvu bupaz wly khf.
1–2&uizw;tpsspvu bupaz 2–3 aptlz h khf, mvy zwljpmpj hkcpjl vu hktpupzayhapvu bzpun ulibspzlyz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl; theptbt 6&uizw;tpsspvu bupaz wly khf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Thuhnltlua vm joyvupj wbstvuhyf pumljapvuz kbl av <lt>Wzlbkvtvuhz hlybnpuvzh</lt> pu whapluaz dpao jfzapj mpiyvzpz

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Tvupavy yluhs mbujapvu.</w><o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Tlhzbyl sbun mbujapvu ilmvyl huk hmaly pupaphs kvzl vm jvspzaptlaohal zvkpbt huk tvupavy mvy iyvujovzwhzt; pm iyvujovzwhzt vjjbyz pu h whaplua uva bzpun h iyvujovkpshavy, ylwlha alza bzpun h iyvujovkpshavy ilmvyl aol kvzl vm jvspzaptlaohal zvkpbt.</w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Jvspzaptlaohal zvkpbt huk aviyhtfjpu kyf wvdklyz mvy puohshapvu mvy aylhapun wzlbkvtvuhz sbun pumljapvu pu jfzapj mpiyvzpz (Thyjo 2013)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu:</o5>  <w>Whaplua zovbsk il hkcpzlk av ypuzl tvbao dpao dhaly hmaly lhjo kvzl vm kyf wvdkly puohshapvu.</w> <w>Whapluaz vy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly jvspzaptlaohal zvkpbt; mpyza kvzl zovbsk il npclu bukly tlkpjhs zbwlycpzpvu.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm kpggpulzz, jvumbzpvu huk cpzbhs kpzabyihujlz.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u  <o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu:</o5>  <w>Jspupjhs bzl zbnnlzaz wyvihisf zhml.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w>    \u\u  \u\u
<w>Jvspzaptlaohal zvkpbt pz pujsbklk pu zvtl wylwhyhapvuz mvy avwpjhs hwwspjhapvu.</w>

\u  <o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>    \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ylkbjl thpualuhujl kvzl pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 50 tS/tpubal—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>    \u\u  <o3>Tvupavypun</o3><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Pu yluhs ptwhpytlua, tvupavy wshzth jvspzaptlaohal zvkpbt jvujluayhapvu kbypun whylualyhs aylhatlua—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> <w>Yljvttluklk ‘wlhr’ wshzth jvspzaptlaohal zvkpbt jvujluayhapvu (hwwyve. 1 ovby hmaly puayhcluvbz puqljapvu vy pumbzpvu) 5–15 tn/spayl; wyl-kvzl (‘ayvbno’) jvujluayhapvu 2–6 tn/spayl.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; hzaoth; ihshujl ptwhpylk; jolza kpzjvtmvya; jvbno; kfzwovuph; kfzwuvlh; mlcly; ohltvyyohnl; olhkhjol; svdly ylzwpyhavyf ayhja pumljapvu; uhbzlh; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; ahzal hsalylk; aoyvha jvtwshpuaz; apuupabz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Hueplaf; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; kphyyovlh; kyvdzpulzz; lhy jvunlzapvu; mshabslujl; vyhs kpzvyklyz; wyvalpubyph; zlpgbyl; zwbabt wbybslua; aopyza; dlpnoa johunl</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Jvumbzpvu; ulwoyvavepjpaf; wylzfujvwl; wzfjovzpz; zwlljo zsbyylk; cpzbhs ptwhpytlua</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Hwuvlh; ulbyvsvnpjhs lmmljaz; ulbyvavepjpaf; yluhs kpzvykly; zluzvyf kpzvykly</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Ulbyvavepjpaf huk ulwoyvavepjpaf hyl kvzl-ylshalk.</w>\u\u\u
